product_name: Kokatat Hydrus 3L Meridian Front Entry Dry Suit with Relief Zipper - Men's
long_description: The Kokatat Hydrus 3L Meridian Front Entry dry suit is a barrier to cold, stroke-sapping waves, and it includes a relief zipper that makes pit stops a breeze. Hydrus 3L waterproof breathable coating keeps you dry in high seas and extreme weather. Outer nylon fabric face resists abrasion and inner knit lining moves moisture away from skin. Latex neck gasket seals with skin to help keep water out. Specialized sleeves enhance freedom of motion and won't restrict movement when paddling. Keep a key or another small item in the self-draining chest pocket. Tough reinforcements at knees and seat boost abrasion resistance and durability. Waterproof front-entry zipper eases dressing and relief zipper speeds pit stops. Reflective highlights on front of suit enhance visibility in low light. Integrated socks are more comfortable than latex gaskets and prevent water from entering suit at legs.
short_description: The Kokatat Hydrus 3L Meridian Front Entry dry suit is a barrier to cold, stroke-sapping waves, and it includes a relief zipper that makes pit stops a breeze.
